Header: Army Troops Clear Passage for Gushing Water under Two Bridges
Content: 16 (V) 16 Gemunu Watch troops of the 581 Brigade on Tuesday (9) on the directions of their Brigade Commander quickly attended to the removal of sewage and a stock of floating bamboo trees down under Aviththawa Bridge in Elpitiya and Wakwella Bridge in Galle on Tuesday (9). The blockades had threatened the sideways of the river bridges which by that stage had reached spill levels with gushing rainy waters. A group of about 50 Army personnel cleared those blockades in both places within a few hours.
